original_text: And the Lord said, “If you had faith like a grain of mustard seed, you could say to this mulberry tree, ‘Be uprooted and planted in the sea,’ and it would obey you.
korean_text: 주께서 이르시되 너희에게 겨자씨 한 알만한 믿음이 있었더라면 이 뽕나무더러 뿌리가 뽑혀 바다에 심기어라 하였을 것이요 그것이 너희에게 순종하였으리라

sentences.original_text: If you had faith like a grain of mustard seed,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희에게 겨자씨 한 알 만한 믿음이 있었다면,

sentences.original_text: you could say to this mulberry tree,
‘Be uprooted and planted in the sea,’
